channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: My superpower is overeating.
item.source:markdown: My superpower is overeating.

item.description: How good are the Brooklyn Nets? #toomuchdrama https://t.co/iI13i6EWFt

item.description: Pregnant women held for months in one Alabama jail to protect fetuses from drugs. https://t.co/bNpajzD6CM
item.source:markdown: Pregnant women held for months in one Alabama jail to protect fetuses from drugs. https://t.co/bNpajzD6CM

item.description: Cable news commercials are obnoxious.
item.source:markdown: Cable news commercials are obnoxious.

item.description: “Realistically, I can’t even tell you if I’m going to be alive in September. And that weighs very heavily on me.” https://t.co/06vf0pZvQv
item.source:markdown: “Realistically, I can’t even tell you if I’m going to be alive in September. And that weighs very heavily on me.” https://t.co/06vf0pZvQv

item.description: Americans think they know a lot about politics — and it’s bad for democracy that they’re so often wrong in their confidence. https://t.co/FwTs0IwBXM
item.source:markdown: Americans think they know a lot about politics — and it’s bad for democracy that they’re so often wrong in their confidence. https://t.co/FwTs0IwBXM

item.description: @Gartenberg i'm going to take my afternoon nap now but will wake up if the earth starts rumbling.
item.source:markdown: @Gartenberg i'm going to take my afternoon nap now but will wake up if the earth starts rumbling.

item.description:
wow he's usually so measured. now the gloves are off?

i think they must've done a focus group that people are fed up waiting for them to do something about the political problem, stop trying to pretend it doesn't exist. https://t.co/meqUjpZPUl
item.source:markdown:
wow he's usually so measured. now the gloves are off?
i think they must've done a focus group that people are fed up waiting for them to do something about the political problem, stop trying to pretend it doesn't exist. https://t.co/meqUjpZPUl

item.description:
@sarahkendzior when we get up and sing god bless america at mlb games we're singing our fascist song.

nothing bad here, nothing we're ashamed of, nothing we've vowed never to do again.

@sarahkendzior when i was growing up -- this was the ideal of the american family we were all to measure ourselves against, including my family of refugees from the holocaust in europe.

there's a lot of "master race" in this picture. https://t.co/dpcsVA6vKV
Elected officials, police chiefs on leaked Oath Keepers list. https://t.co/9GnnsuCbow
item.source:markdown: Elected officials, police chiefs on leaked Oath Keepers list. https://t.co/9GnnsuCbow

item.description:
There was an excellent MSNBC show about the Civil War last night. At one point they interviewed a current-day Confederate. They almost got to the best question to ask such a person, which is:

Would you like to be a slave?

I'd love to hear the answer. to that.
item.source:markdown:
There was an excellent MSNBC show about the Civil War last night. At one point they interviewed a current-day Confederate. They almost got to the best question to ask such a person, which is:
Would you like to be a slave?
I'd love to hear the answer. to that.

item.description: Judge removes Griffin from office for engaging in the January 6 insurrection. https://t.co/3NR6nRrA3C
item.source:markdown: Judge removes Griffin from office for engaging in the January 6 insurrection. https://t.co/3NR6nRrA3C

item.description: @raymondcamden that's what i want -- to dream about places to live beyond what's for sale right now. and if someone wants to pay me $10 million for my house -- hmm.
item.source:markdown: @raymondcamden that's what i want -- to dream about places to live beyond what's for sale right now. and if someone wants to pay me $10 million for my house -- hmm.

item.description: There should be an inverse real estate market where buyers could list their requirements. Sellers could peruse, the way buyers scan Zillow now. Who knows if I'm looking in the right geography? There could be lots of places that match my desires.
item.source:markdown: There should be an inverse real estate market where buyers could list their requirements. Sellers could peruse, the way buyers scan Zillow now. Who knows if I'm looking in the right geography? There could be lots of places that match my desires.

item.description: @jayrosen_nyu @HC_Richardson @Will_Bunch we let them make that decision for us.
item.source:markdown: @jayrosen_nyu @HC_Richardson @Will_Bunch we let them make that decision for us.

item.description: Most tweets promote the author rather than good ideas, although they think they're promoting good ideas. Most of the people who read them, if any do, already agree with them, or don't and are using their tweets to evoke strong body chemistry that they are physically addicted to.
item.source:markdown: Most tweets promote the author rather than good ideas, although they think they're promoting good ideas. Most of the people who read them, if any do, already agree with them, or don't and are using their tweets to evoke strong body chemistry that they are physically addicted to.
